Text: try for fun. but just so u know, the bomberman games (5 of them) to super nintendo (run with emulator snes9x for xbox) is much more fun. many more levels (not just one) with various themes on them. more bonuses, support for not only for 4 human players but also cpu-controlled-bots. ie 4 humans vs 1 comp (yes 5 players instead of 4 in one of the games). or 2 humans vs 2 comp. Apart from all that there is also adventure mode (instead of battle mode) which u can play alone or 2 players. ;)
